item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Little Snitch: Network Monitor and Application Firewall for macOS (100 points | 44 comments)
2. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (119 points | 27 comments)
3. The Cody Computer (59 points | 7 comments)
4. Is Iceland getting ready to join the EU? (185 points | 345 comments)
5. The Zombocom Problem (71 points | 14 comments)
6. Jimmy Carter has died (830 points | 438 comments)
7. Show HN: Chorus, a Mac app that lets you chat a bunch of AIs at once (31 points | 9 comments)
8. TWISTED: The dramatic history of twisted-pair Ethernet (48 points | 4 comments)
9. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (1183 points | 885 comments)
10. The last Inca bridge master (56 points | 6 comments)
11. Brave Care Has Closed (24 points | 39 comments)
12. Show HN: WIP NandToTetris Emulator in pure C – logic gates to ALU to CPU to PC (5 points | 2 comments)
13. Belgium will ban sales of disposable e-cigarettes in a first for the EU (55 points | 40 comments)
14. WebGL Fluid Simulation (369 points | 49 comments)
15. 'ruthlessly imaginative' 1925 predictions for the future come true – mostly (6 points | discuss)
16. Israel built an 'AI factory' for war. It unleashed it in Gaza (19 points | 1 comment)
17. Trying to use Bluesky without getting burned again (130 points | 245 comments)
18. I was wrong about the ethics crisis (215 points | 298 comments)
19. I Run LLMs Locally (234 points | 149 comments)
20. Faster CI with Selective Testing (9 points | 2 comments)
21. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (166 points | 16 comments)
22. Melbourne Train Control System is running on a hardware emulated PDP11 (95 points | 22 comments)
23. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (335 points | 104 comments)
24. Breaking NATO Radio Encryption [video] (74 points | 19 comments)
25. Are PC hardware companies driving technology into restricted closed ecosystems? (180 points | 122 comments)
26. Om Malik – The Story of Stent (40 points | 1 comment)
27. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (144 points | 145 comments)
28. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (615 points | 392 comments)
29. Can LLMs accurately recall the Bible? (147 points | 94 comments)
30. I automated my job application process (582 points | 790 comments)
